message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
I understand you're interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. Let me know if that works for you.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85.
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I think $105 is a fair price considering the product's value to you. It's a good compromise between our previous discussions.
